string-array.name: mask_action_session
string-array.item: Tag matching inventoried → A\nTag not matching inventoried → B
Tag matching inventoried → A\nTag not matching do nothing
Tag matching do nothing\nTag not matching inventoried → B
Tag matching A → B, B → A\nTag not matching do nothing
Tag matching inventoried → B\nTag not matching inventoried → A
Tag matching inventoried → B\nTag not matching do nothing
Tag matching do nothing\nTag not matching inventoried → A
Tag matching do nothing\nTag not matching A → B, B → A

string-array.name: mask_action_select
string-array.item: Tag matching assert SL\nTag not matching deassert SL

Tag matching do nothing\nTag not matching deassert SL
